DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this project is to determine whether prompting the recipient of a health reminder mailing to scratch off targeted area.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of a Scratch Off Prompt on Health Engagement
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators will randomly assign individuals with different scratch off messages to 3 groups. The investigators are interested in whether the scratch off message will result in an increase in compliance with the recommended health behavior.
DOC.criteria: Indications according to Spring 2011 CDC criteria for a blood pressure check Indications according to Spring 2011 CDC criteria for a cholesterol test Employee at partner corporation that implemented the study
